warmup_steps.description: Absolute number of warmup steps. If > 0, this overrides warmup_epochs. If <= 0 and warmup_epochs > 0, will be converted to steps (requires batches_per_epoch to be provided).

warmup_epochs.description: Number of warmup epochs. Only used when warmup_steps <= 0. Converted to steps by multiplying with batches_per_epoch. Ignored if warmup_steps > 0.

warmup_factor.description: Starting learning rate factor (0.0-1.0). E.g., 0.1 means start from 0.1x of base learning rate.
